mapper.select: select count(*) as ct from coding_test where a_no=#{a_no} and p_level=#{p_level} group by p_level
SELECT ROWNUM , coding_test.* FROM coding_test WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM p_date) = #{year} AND a_no = #{a_no} ORDER BY ct_no DESC
select s_no from study_in where a_no=#{a_no}
select count(*) from coding_test where a_no=#{a_no}

select c.ct_no_rank from ( SELECT a.a_no, COUNT(c.ct_no) AS ct_no_count, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(c.ct_no) DESC) AS ct_no_rank FROM study_in a LEFT JOIN coding_test c ON a.a_no = c.a_no AND c.p_date > a.s_a_regdate WHERE a.s_no = #{s_no} GROUP BY a.a_no) c where c.a_no=#{a_no}
select count(*) from study_in where s_no=#{s_no}
select count(distinct p_date) as num_day from coding_test where a_no=#{a_no} and extract(month from p_date)=extract(month from sysdate)
SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(s_a_regdate) AS days_passed FROM study_in WHERE a_no = #{a_no} and s_no=#{s_no}
select nvl(a_nick, '멤버') from account where a_no=#{a_no}
select distinct(extract(year from s_a_regdate)) from study_in where a_no=#{a_no} order by extract(year from s_a_regdate) desc
select p_date, count(ct_no) as ct from coding_test where a_no=#{a_no} and extract(year from p_date)=#{year} group by p_date
